name: Verify Market Segment enabled on Renewal transaction when program is CannGen

testSteps.description: Given underwriter has ability to create policy

And with Program and Market Segment as
| Program | MarketSegment |
| CannGen | Mixed Operations |
And underwriter creates and books policy
And underwriter is on home page
When underwriter selects Renew transaction on policy
Then Market Segment should be enable for policy

userStory.storyName: Renewal term should be displayed as Issued status until prior term expiresﾠ(PI-2314)
